text: One day I was thinking about why we can’t have an editor that’s written in Julia and you can extend it with native Julia code? Like VSCode on steroid...

elements.text: One day I was thinking about why we can’t have an editor that’s written in Julia and you can extend it with native Julia code? Like VSCode on steroid...

text: You might find my attempt to extend emacs with Julia interesting: <https://github.com/dangirsh/libjulia.el|https://github.com/dangirsh/libjulia.el>
